description: Try our easy to follow Ginger Beef & Ramen Noodle Stir-Fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ginger Beef & Ramen Noodle Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat remaining oil in same wok or frying pan over medium-high heat. Stir-fry garlic, ginger and red onion for 3 minutes or until softened. Add pak choy, rainbow vegetables, noodles, beef and sauce mixture. Stir-fry for 2 minutes or until vegetables are tender and heated through. Serve sprinkled with seeds and spring onion.
